full_text:
Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 755 Filed 08/10/22 Page 254 of 262 1965 LC8VMAX8 Rodgers - redirect
1 BY MS. COMEY:
2 Q. When did you meet the person in those photographs?
3 A. September of 2003.
4 Q. And about when do you remember meeting Jane?
5 A. November of 1996.
6 Q. And what makes you feel so confident?
7 A. Based upon my logbook.
8 Q. Do you remember ever meeting anyone else on Jeffrey Epstein's planes who had that same first name other than those two people?
9 A. I do not.
10 MS. COMEY: One moment, your Honor.
11 THE COURT: Okay.
12 (Counsel conferred)
13 MS. COMEY: Nothing further.
14 MR. EVERDELL: Nothing, your Honor.
15 THE COURT: All right.
16 Mr. Rodgers, you may step down. You are excused.
17 THE WITNESS: Thank you.
18 (Witness excused)
19 THE COURT: And, members of the jury, we'll break for the -- I assume you don't have a six-minute witness.
20 MS. COMEY: No, your Honor.
21 THE COURT: Okay. We'll break for the evening. Same schedule tomorrow. And thank you so much.
22 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300
23 DOJ-OGR-00013532
